Uses of Class
org.assertj.swing.core.MouseButton

  • Packages that use MouseButton 
    Package Description
    org.assertj.swing.core
    Low-level components that enable functional testing of AWT and Swing Components.
    org.assertj.swing.driver
    Component-specific test drivers.
    org.assertj.swing.fixture
    Public API, source of FEST's power and flexibility.
